text:
**Bundles update** ❤️

Now you can combine your gifts into **Bundles** and sell or collect them together

It’s a new way to manage your inventory and show off unique collections

**How to create a Bundle?**
1 - Open My Gifts
2 - Tap the new Bundles button
3 - Select up to 45 gifts and arrange them in the order you want

**What can you do with Bundles?**
- Keep gifts as a full pack
- Sell them on the market in one click
- Disassemble anytime — gifts return to your inventory separately

**Why Bundles?**
- Easier to manage large inventories
- show complete sets, not just single gifts
- Higher perceived value when selling multiple gifts together

Note: Gifts inside Bundles still keep their own properties and can be managed separately once disassembled

[**Create your collection**](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=)

__Game__ __change is coming...__ ❤️
